.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.Models.CalculateBaselineResponse CalculateBaseline(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.IMetricBaselineOperations operations, string resourceUri, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.Models.TimeSeriesInformation timeSeriesInformation) cil managed

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.

The identifier of the resource. It has the following structure: subscriptions/{subscriptionName}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{providerName}/{resourceName}. For example: subscriptions/b368ca2f-e298-46b7-b0ab-012281956afa/resourceGroups/vms/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/vm1
Information that need to be specified to calculate a baseline on a time series.
Docs.summary: **Lists the baseline values for a resource**.

<Extension()> Public Function Get (operations As IMetricBaselineOperations, resourceUri As String, metricName As String, Optional timespan As String = null, Optional interval As Nullable(Of TimeSpan) = null, Optional aggregation As String = null, Optional sensitivities As String = null, Optional resultType As Nullable(Of ResultType) = null) As BaselineResponse

static member Get : Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.IMetricBaselineOperations * string * string * string * Nullable<TimeSpan> * string * string * Nullable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.Models.ResultType> -> Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.Models.BaselineResponse
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.Monitor.MetricBaselineOperationsExtensions.Get (operations, resourceUri, metricName, timespan, interval, aggregation, sensitivities, resultType)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.

The identifier of the resource. It has the following structure: subscriptions/{subscriptionName}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{providerName}/{resourceName}. For example: subscriptions/b368ca2f-e298-46b7-b0ab-012281956afa/resourceGroups/vms/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/vm1
The name of the metric to retrieve the baseline for.
The timespan of the query. It is a string with the following format 'startDateTime_ISO/endDateTime_ISO'.
The interval (i.e. timegrain) of the query.
The aggregation type of the metric to retrieve the baseline for.
The list of sensitivities (comma separated) to retrieve.
Allows retrieving only metadata of the baseline. On data request all information is retrieved. Possible values include: 'Data', 'Metadata'
Docs.summary: **Gets the baseline values for a specific metric**.
